type: Tutorial Step - Profile in a Heartbeat

definition.text: The Profile Constructor is the device you will use to set up your profile.

paragraphs.text: It will also create a unique Binance Smart Chain wallet that is connected with your profile. We call it your Governance Address.
However, if you already own a BSC wallet you will have the option to link that address instead of creating a new one.

Your Governance Address will allow you to receive the SA tokens you earn. Superalgos will read the balance of this address to become aware of the number of SA tokens you hold, and assign your profile an equivalent amount of Token Power.
